option.name: originalContent
option.value:
import { Header } from '../components/Header'; import { Footer } from '../components/Footer'; import { BookIcon, MusicIcon, CoffeeIcon, UsersIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import { SEO } from '../components/SEO'; import { ScrollAnimationObserver } from '../components/ScrollAnimationObserver'; // Import About page images import boardGamesImg from '../assets/board-games.webp'; import coffeeImg from '../assets/cuppacino.webp'; import redVelvetImg from '../assets/red-velvet.webp'; import vinylRecordsImg from '../assets/vinyl-records.webp'; export const About = () => { return (
{/* Section 1: Hero - "Our Story" - DARK */}

Our Story

Coffee, Community, and a Retro Beat.

Contact Us
{/* Section 2: Community & Atmosphere - "Stay Awhile" */}

Stay Awhile

At Cafe Crave, we believe in creating spaces where people can connect, relax, and feel at home. Our cafe isn't just about great coffee—it's about the moments you share while enjoying it.

With cozy booths, comfortable seating, and a collection of over 50 board games, we've designed our space to be family-friendly and welcoming to all. Whether you're meeting friends, working remotely, or just enjoying some quiet time, we've got a spot for you.

Everyone is welcome at our table
{/* Section 3: Coffee & Food Philosophy - "The Good Stuff" */}

The Good Stuff

Crafted with Care

We source our coffee beans from ethical, sustainable farms and roast them locally to ensure the freshest cup possible. Our baristas are trained to perfect their craft, creating not just drinks, but experiences.

Our kitchen creates fresh pastries and light meals daily, using locally-sourced ingredients whenever possible. We believe good food, like good coffee, should be made with intention and care.

{/* Section 4: Music Identity - "On the Turntable" */}

On the Turntable

Music is the heartbeat of Cafe Crave. We're always spinning something special, from classics to deep cuts, creating a soundtrack for your visit that's as carefully curated as our coffee menu.

Our vinyl collection spans decades and genres, reflecting our love for the warm, authentic sound that only records can provide—much like the authentic experience we strive to create in every other aspect of our cafe.

See What's Playing
{/* Section 5: Booking Callout */}

Ready to Visit?

Reserve your table now and join us for coffee, conversation, and community.

Contact Us
); };

option.value:
import { Header } from '../components/Header'; import { Footer } from '../components/Footer'; import { MapPinIcon, PhoneIcon, ClockIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import { SEO } from '../components/SEO'; import { ScrollAnimationObserver } from '../components/ScrollAnimationObserver'; // Custom icon components const InstagramIcon = ({ size }: { size: number }) => ( ); const FacebookIcon = ({ size }: { size: number }) => ( ); const WhatsAppIcon = ({ size, className }: { size: number; className?: string }) => ( ); export const ContactPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section - DARK */}

Contact & Visit Crave Café

Stop by for great coffee, music, and community

{/* Contact Section - DARK */}

Contact & Hours

Address

219 Imam Haron Rd, Claremont
Cape Town, 7708

Phone

073 565 1888

WhatsApp

073 565 1888

Chat with us directly

Hours

  • Monday: 10 am–6 pm
  • Tuesday: 8:30 am–6 pm
  • Wednesday: 8:30 am–6 pm
  • Thursday: 8:30 am–6 pm
  • Friday: 8:30 am–12 pm, 2–9 pm
  • Saturday: 8:30 am–9 pm
  • Sunday: 10 am–6 pm

Follow Us

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
import { Header } from '../components/Header'; import { Footer } from '../components/Footer'; import { SEO } from '../components/SEO'; import { EventPreview } from '../components/EventPreview'; import { GoogleReviews } from '../components/GoogleReviews'; import { ScrollAnimationObserver } from '../components/ScrollAnimationObserver'; import { CalendarIcon, MusicIcon, UsersIcon, CoffeeIcon, ArrowRightIcon, CheckCircleIcon } from 'lucide-react'; export const EventsPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section - Image Hero */}

Events at Crave

Where community meets culture. Join us for live music, vinyl nights, board game tournaments, and unforgettable experiences.

View Upcoming Events
{/* Features Section - lightBg */}

What We Offer

From intimate acoustic sessions to community gatherings, we create memorable experiences

Live Music

Intimate performances featuring local artists, jazz nights, and vinyl listening sessions

Community Events

Board game nights, book clubs, trivia contests, and social gatherings

Coffee Workshops

Learn from our baristas about brewing techniques, latte art, and coffee culture

Private Events

Book our space for birthdays, meetings, product launches, and celebrations

{/* Host Your Event Section - redBg */}

Host Your Event at Crave

From soulful acoustic sessions to cozy celebrations — Crave Café is where great coffee, good music, and real connections come together. Bring your people, and we’ll bring the vibe.

Flexible Space

ASpace that fits your crowd — intimate or buzzing, we'll make it work.

Sound System

Great acoustics, great tunes — our setup's built for music and memories.

Catering Available

Crom espresso bars to gourmet bites — let our kitchen keep your guests smiling.

Unique Atmosphere

Retro décor, vinyl vibes, and the warm hum of conversation — Crave's got soul.

Book the Space

Perfect For:

  • Birthday Parties & Private Celebrations
  • Game nights & Book Clubs
  • Community Gatherings & Markets
  • Art Exhibitions & Pop-ups
  • Live Music & Performances
  • Community Gatherings

Availability

Evenings & Weekends

Contact us for weekday availability

{/* Upcoming Events Section - darkBg */}

Upcoming Events

Join us for live music, community gatherings, and special occasions

{/* Reviews Section - lightBg */}
{/* CTA Section - redBg */}

Never Miss an Event

Follow us on social media to stay updated on all our upcoming events, special performances, and community gatherings.

Follow Us on Instagram Contact Us
); };
